docs.snippet: TOKYO, April 13 (AP) The Japanese Davis Cup tennis team, having sewn up the right to face Australia in the Eastern Zone Section A final here, made it a 5-0 sweep over South Vietnam in their semifinal series  today.
docs.lead_paragraph: TOKYO, April 13 (AP) The Japanese Davis Cup tennis team, having sewn up the right to face Australia in the Eastern Zone Section A final here, made it a 5-0 sweep over South Vietnam in their semifinal series today.

headline.main: JAPAN AND COLOMBIA FINISH OFF CUP FOES

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 13(AP) The head of Uruguay's police intelligence branch was shot to death by machine gunners here today, and the police authorities began searching for a left-wing terrorist group believed to have killed six other policemen...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 13(AP) The head of Uruguay's police intelligence branch was shot to death by machine gunners here today, and the police authorities began searching for a left-wing terrorist group believed to have killed six other policemen since last July.

headline.main: High Police Official Slain in Montevideo; Terrorists Sought

docs.snippet: City narcotics detectives found 220 pounds of pure heroin in a Chelsea apartment yesterday in what was described as one of the largest seizures of illegal drugs in the city's history.
docs.lead_paragraph: City narcotics detectives found 220 pounds of pure heroin in a Chelsea apartment yesterday in what was described as one of the largest seizures of illegal drugs in the city's history.
docs.abstract: NYC police, in what is described as 1 of largest seizures of illegal drugs in city's history, raid Chelsea apt and seize 220 lbs of pure heroin valued at $60-million; E de Risso, A Picardo, J Aparicio and J Rodriguez held; 2 lbs of pure cocaine also seized; police comment; illus

headline.main: BIG HEROIN CACHE SEIZED IN CHELSEA; Value Is Put at $60-Million 4 Suspects Are Arrested

docs.snippet: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay, April 22--Peru's revolutionary military regime today urged Latin America to adopt a new political orientation that would abandon capitalism and at the same time prevent Communism from spreading through the region.
docs.lead_paragraph: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay, April 22--Peru's revolutionary military regime today urged Latin America to adopt a new political orientation that would abandon capitalism and at the same time prevent Communism from spreading through the region.

headline.main: PERU ADVOCATES NEW ORIENTATION; Official Calls for Abandoning Capitalism While Blocking Spread of Communism STRESSES STATE GOALS Inter-American Development Bank Delegates Hear Him Defend Nationalization No Balance Found

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: AMERICAN NATIONS AND WESTERN HEMISPHERE POSSESSIONS

byline.original: By H.J. MAIDENBERG Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: THE peripatetic Dr. Antonio Barone Forzano is a Brazilian veterinarian and physician. He is also president of the Brazil Kennel Club and one of eight all-round judges in the South American nation.
docs.lead_paragraph: THE peripatetic Dr. Antonio Barone Forzano is a Brazilian veterinarian and physician. He is also president of the Brazil Kennel Club and one of eight all-round judges in the South American nation.

headline.main: South America's Kennel Clubs Helped by Airborne Advocate
